name: ORPMina2
description:
Classic game. Throw sea bombs into water and try hit enemy submarines. This game is a big challange for your reflexes and sense of distance.

- 30 levels full of ships
- 6 areas (Baltic Sea, Artic Oceans and more)
- 10 bonuses from new life to better weapon (tap the chest for bonus)
- 3 powerful bosses
- Sea monsters
- ... and nice fish

You can also download it for Windows 8.x from:

Windows Store

See our web site for more products:

Rozen Software

Note: the free version includes ads.
